gold.user: User wants to get autocomplete suggestions for JQL queries to help construct their search more efficiently.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of autocomplete suggestions based on the current input.

gold.user: User submits a JQL query fragment to receive autocomplete suggestions for fields and values.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of autocomplete suggestions based on the submitted JQL fragment.

gold.user: User wants to retrieve specific field suggestions for a given JQL query string.
gold.ideal: Returns field-specific autocomplete suggestions relevant to the provided query string.

gold.user: User sends a JQL query to be parsed for validation and structure analysis.
gold.ideal: Returns a structured representation of the parsed JQL query along with any validation errors.

gold.user: User needs to migrate legacy JQL queries to the new format for compatibility.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of migrated queries with any necessary adjustments made for the new format.

gold.user: User wants to sanitize a JQL query to remove any potentially harmful content.
gold.ideal: Returns a sanitized version of the JQL query, ensuring it is safe for execution.
